Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. This product not only serves its intended purpose exceptionally well but also adds a touch of elegance to your daily routine. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering you this unique opportunity to own it for $200. I trust you'll find its value far exceeds the price, making it a worthwhile investment for you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
